record.title: MOMENT OF SILENCE IN MEMORY OF FALLEN HEROES IN IRAQ WAR

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I rise today because today marks the 4-year anniversary of the war in Iraq. I would like to offer a moment of silence for the 19 members of my unit that did not make it home from Iraq, and for the thousands of brave Americans that have fallen.
On this somber occasion, we must commit ourselves to honoring the memories of the fallen, and continue to do right by our troops still fighting.

record.chair: Members will rise and the House will observe a moment of silence.
